name: savings-management-system-client-application
description: 1. Clone the repository: `git clone <repo-url>` 2. Install dependencies: `npm install` 3. Copy `.env.example` to `.env` and fill in the values (e.g., `MONGO_URI`, `JWT_SECRET`). 4. Start MongoDB locally or via Docker. 5. Run the server: `npm start`
